Text.Page:
Thulsa's forces are heavily augmented by constructs. His command of dark magic is all but absolute, which means the fortress is incredibly durable. If we can control it, we'll have a powerful asset in the war against the argons.

To weaken the legions, I want you to slay {@LinkCreature:27#4#eldritch sentinels}. Their fighting ability is considerable, so eliminating them is vital.
With the sentinels destroyed, we have a chance to break through their lines. You must excuse me. I must report this to Velnen!
Those sentinels stand in the way of our counterattack. They must be destroyed.
